icecreams.name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
icecreams.description: Caramel Cheesecake Ice Cream with Graham Cracker-Covered Cheesecake Truffles & Chocolate Cookie Swirls
icecreams.story: In your cheesecake dreams, is it like you’re spooning through a world of caramel cheesecake ice cream swirled with chocolate cookies in a wonderland of truffles filled with cheesecake? Hello? You can wake up now…
icecreams.allergy_info: contains milk, eggs, wheat and soy

icecreams.name: Chillin' the Roast™
icecreams.description: Cold Brew Coffee Ice Cream with Chocolate Cookie-Covered Coffee Liqueur Truffles & Fudge Swirls
icecreams.story: Our cold brew coffee ice cream not only delivers a chillacious blast of creamy caffeination, it’s also loaded with enough coffee liqueur-filled, cookie crumble-covered truffles to fuel a truffolution.
icecreams.allergy_info: contains milk, eggs, wheat and soy

icecreams.name: Chocolate Shake It™
icecreams.description: Chocolate Malt Milkshake Ice Cream with Chocolate Cookie-Covered Fudge Truffles & Marshmallow Swirls
icecreams.story: For those who prefer their ice cream shaken, swirled, and truffled, here’s a chocolate malt milkshake and marshmallow creation we truffled up with euphoric morsels of cookie crumble-covered fudge.
icecreams.allergy_info: contains milk, eggs, wheat and soy

icecreams.name: One Sweet World
icecreams.description: Coffee Caramel Ice Creams with Fudge Chunks & Swirls of Marshmallow & Salted Caramel
icecreams.story: At Ben & Jerry’s, we believe the world is sweetest when we stand together as one. That’s why we’re asking you to join us in digging deeper to understand issues of racial justice in America. Learn more and take action at benjerry.com/digdeeper

icecreams.name: Americone Dream®
icecreams.description: Vanilla Ice Cream with Fudge-Covered Waffle Cone Pieces & a Caramel Swirl
icecreams.story: Founded in fudge-covered waffle cones, this caramel-swirled concoction is the only flavor that gets a s'cream of approval from The Late Show host, Stephen Colbert. What's sweeter is this flavor supports charitable causes through The Stephen Colbert AmeriCone Dream Fund.

icecreams.name: Banana Split
icecreams.description: Banana & Strawberry Ice Creams with Walnuts, Fudge Chunks & a Fudge Swirl
icecreams.story: We turned the classic ice cream parlor sundae you've always loved into the at-home flavor creation you've always wanted. Enjoy!

icecreams.name: Blondie Ambition™
icecreams.description: Buttery Brown Sugar Ice Cream with Blonde Brownies and Butterscotch Toffee Flakes
icecreams.story: What makes Ben & Jerry's so euphoric? Some say it's the legendary creamy-richness of our flavor creations. Others say it's the tastebud-boggling combinations of spoon-bending chunks & perfect swirls. We say, "Enjoy!"
